caption: Deploy ERC-1155 Collection
doc: Deploy a ERC-1155 collection smart contract.

AEU.caption: Name
AEU.doc: The name of this ERC-1155 smart contract. This will only be visible when viewing this NFT collection on NFT marketplaces such as OpenSea or Rarible.
AEU.name: name

AEV.caption: Description
AEV.default_val: This ERC-1155 smart contract token was deployed using The web3 toolbox created by JackMorgan.xyz
AEV.doc: The description of this ERC-1155 smart contract. This will be visible when viewing this NFT collection on NFT marketplaces such as OpenSea or Rarible. of this ERC-721 smart contract. This will only be visible when viewing this NFT collection on NFT marketplaces such as OpenSea or Rarible.
AEV.name: description

AEW.caption: Image
AEW.doc: The image of this ERC-1155 smart contract. This will be visible when viewing this NFT collection on NFT marketplaces such as OpenSea or Rarible. This can be the value of a image uploader or an IPFS links formatted: ipfs://<CID>
AEW.name: image

AEX.caption: Symbol
AEX.doc: The symbol of this ERC-1155 smart contract. This will only be visible when viewing this ERC-20 smart contract on a block explorer.
AEX.name: symbol

AEY.caption: Primary Sale Recipient
AEY.doc: The wallet address that will receive the funds generated from the initial sale of NFTs minted from this smart contract.
AEY.name: primary_sale_recipient

AEZ.caption: Royalty Fee Recipient
AEZ.doc: Optional: The wallet address that will receive the funds generated from secondary sales of NFTs minted from this smart contract.
AEZ.name: royalty_fee_recipient

AEa.caption: Royalty Fee Percentage
AEa.doc: Optional: The percentage in basis points of secondary sales on NFTs minted from the market place that will be sent to the royalty fee recipient.
AEa.name: royalty_fee_percentage
